PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council to UPHOLD Decision 2001-628 made by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission on August 4, 2001, concerning the refusal to issue a broadcasting licence to Radio Enfant, a community radio station dedicated to children and youth.
